CURRICULUM VITAE
PERSONAL DETAILS
Full name:
TRUONG THI BIEN
Job: Tester

August, 27th1991

Duy Tan Street, Cau GiayDistrict, Ha Noi
City

BACKGROUND
Graduated at Commercial University with Information System Management major
Have a software testing certificate at Hanoi Tester Center
Have3yearsexperiencein software testing for FPT Software
Ability to learn quickly, can work with complex technique project and high pressure.
Good time management skill,Good at communication.
Good at team-work and able to work independently.
Flexibility, Creativity and hard-working.
Confident and friendly.
Positive thinking.
Be working in core team of system.
 Another.

Functional Experience/Skill Set

SQL Server , ORACLE

Project name 1
1) PETMIG 17
Position and role
Tester
Project description
PETMIG17is a migration project. The purpose of this
project is to upgrade 118 applications from
SP2007/2010 to SP2013 and .Net 2.0 to .Net 4.5.

Manual test, find and log bugs to Jirasystem, create
test report after finishing testing process.

To: 08/2017

and .Net
The biggest team size up to 76 members.

To: 05/2018
Project name 3
3) PAMS
Position and role
Tester
Project description
PAMS (PETROLEUM AGREEMENT
MANAGEMENT SYSTEM) is a regulatory body in
PETRONAS responsible to manage and steer the
overall upstream activities in Malaysia. One of the
areais the arrangement of the Production Sharing
Contract (PSC) and Risk Sharing Contract (RSC)
between PETRONAS and other 30 companies of
which 25 different international companies are
Operators.
Participate in and implement the Test for team size 21
members.
Technologies UsedMicrosoft SQL server 2014
Responsibilities
•
Analyzing requirements
•
Create testcases
•
Execute system test & Regression test
•
Logging and Tracking Bugs-> Retest after the
bugs is fixed
•
Create test report
•
Set up the environment toperform the testing
From: 06/2018
To: 11/2018
Projectname 4
4) BOC
Position and role
Tester
Project description
BOC (PGB Balance of Consequences & Recognition
Program System ) is business requires a program that
can systematically facilitate,administer, monitor, track
and store data in one centralize database of staff with
regards matters on PGB Balanced Consequence &
Recognition Program. Two parts of the program i.e.
consequences for undesired behaviors and recognition
for positive behaviors.
The biggest team size up to 30 members.
Technologies UsedMicrosoft SQL server 2014
Responsibilities
•
Analyzing requirements-> Write Q&A to ask
BA
•
Createtestcases,Create test report
•
Execute system test, Function test, Regression
test and Smoketest
•
Logging and Tracking Bugs-> Retest after the
bugs is fixed
•
Set up the environment to perform the testing
•
Training for new member
•
Support other testers
•
Management tester team
•
Test on mobile (Iphone 6S, Samsung A8 2018,
Samsung J7 Prime, Oppo F9)
•
Bydaily, sent report to PM, Dev Lead

To: 12/2018

CAREER OBJECTIVE
I want to work in a dynamic and professional environment. I hopethat I will have
favorable working environment which motivates me to develop myself and do well the job,
learn more knowledge and life skills from colleagues. Through the studying process and
take part in some projects, i had the skills and knowledge aboutbasic informatics as well as
my specialization such as design, website programming and software applications. In
addition, I am a sociable person, have solidarity and have ability to work in teams as well as
independently in environments with high pressure.
Because the skills and experience outlined above, I believe that i can fully meet the
requirements of the company. Working according to my hobby and specialization is my
desire.  Tester is my job to be connected with me for a long time.
Thanks for watching!
